activities.name: Old Walled City Tour
activities.description: Explore the colorful streets and historic landmarks of Cartagena's UNESCO World Heritage site
activities.longDescription: Experience the magic of Cartagena's enchanting Old Walled City on this guided walking tour. Wander through narrow cobblestone streets lined with pastel-colored colonial buildings, hidden plazas, and centuries-old fortifications. Your expert guide will share fascinating stories about the city's rich history, from its founding as a slave trading port to its role as a pirate stronghold. Visit iconic landmarks including the San Felipe fortress, Cathedral Basilica, and charming local shops. This tour captures the essence of what makes Cartagena one of South America's most romantic destinations.
includes: Comfortable pace suitable for all fitness levels
activities.meetingPoint: Plaza Santo Domingo, Cartagena Old City

activities.name: Rosario Islands Adventure
activities.description: Snorkeling and island hopping in the beautiful Rosario Islands
activities.longDescription: Escape to paradise with this full-day adventure to the stunning Rosario Islands archipelago. Crystal-clear turquoise waters, pristine white-sand beaches, and vibrant coral reefs await you. Snorkel alongside tropical fish, sea turtles, and colorful coral formations in some of the Caribbean's most beautiful dive sites. Visit multiple islands, relax on secluded beaches, and enjoy fresh seafood lunch prepared on the boat. Perfect for both experienced snorkelers and beginners, this is the ultimate Caribbean island experience.

activities.name: Caribbean Sunset Cruise
activities.description: Romantic sunset cruise along the Caribbean coast with drinks and snacks
activities.longDescription: Experience the magic of a Caribbean sunset from the deck of a beautiful sailboat. Watch the sky transform into shades of orange, pink, and purple as you cruise along Cartagena's pristine coastline. Enjoy complimentary drinks and snacks while mingling with fellow travelers or spending quality time with your loved one. Perfect for couples, friends, or solo travelers seeking a memorable evening. The breeze, the views, and the atmosphere combine to create an unforgettable experience.

activities.name: Local Street Food Tour
activities.description: Taste authentic Cartagena cuisine with a local guide
activities.longDescription: Dive into the authentic flavors of Cartagena on this gastronomic walking tour. Explore hidden food stalls, family-run restaurants, and vibrant markets guided by a knowledgeable local. Taste traditional dishes like ceviche, arepas, patacones, and dulce de leche. Learn about local ingredients, traditional cooking methods, and the cultural significance of each dish. This isn't just a food tour‚Äîit's a cultural immersion that reveals the soul of Cartagena through its cuisine.
includes: All tips for food vendors included
activities.availability: Tuesday to Sunday at 10:00 AM and 4:00 PM

activities.name: Volcano Mud Bath Experience
activities.description: Unique mud bath experience at Totumo Volcano with therapeutic benefits
activities.longDescription: Experience a one-of-a-kind natural phenomenon at Totumo Volcano. This dormant volcano contains warm, mineral-rich mud believed to have therapeutic and healing properties. Float effortlessly in the mud as your guide explains the geological history and health benefits. The experience is both relaxing and invigorating. After your mud bath, rinse off in a nearby cenote with fresh water, then enjoy a local lunch. A truly unique and rejuvenating experience you won't find anywhere else.

activities.name: Night Club & Salsa Dancing
activities.description: Experience Cartagena's vibrant nightlife with salsa dancing
activities.longDescription: Feel the rhythm of Cartagena's legendary nightlife! Start with a fun salsa dancing lesson from a professional instructor, then head to one of the city's hottest night clubs. Dance to live reggaeton, salsa, and Caribbean music alongside locals and fellow travelers. The energy is infectious, the drinks are flowing, and the party atmosphere is electric. This is your chance to experience Cartagena's famous nightlife scene like a true local. Whether you're an experienced dancer or a complete beginner, everyone is welcome.
activities.meetingPoint: Hotel zone meeting point (details provided after booking)
